c goes to /k/; o goes to /o/; n goes to: d goes to /d̪/; apostrophes do not affect pronunciation
h is silent; a goes to /a/

k o n: r e tʃ i o n
c goes to /k/; o goes to /o/; n goes to: r goes to /r/ word initially; e goes to /e/; ch goes to /tʃ/; i goes to /i/

k o n: s i e ɡ l o
c goes to /k/; o goes to /o/; n goes to: s goes to /s/; g goes to /g/; l goes to /l/
p goes to /p/; r goes to /ɾ/

k o n: r e a l i d̪ a t̪
m u n i θ i p i o
c goes to /k/; o goes to /o/; n goes to: m goes to /m/; u goes to /u/; c goes to /θ/ before front vowels

k o n: s i t̪ u a t̪ a
f u o ɾ o n
p ɾ o b i n θ i a
ɡ u a i ɾ e
l i n ɡ u i s t̪ i k a
k o n s e k u e n θ i a
a r e d̪ o l
